value.title: Configure Power BI report filters
value.excerpt: Report filtering is a complex topic because many techniques are available for filtering a Microsoft Power BI report. However, with complexity comes control, allowing you to design reports that meet requirements and expectations.

value.title: Propose a solution as a Solution Architect for Power Platform and Dynamics 365
value.excerpt: Learn how to propose a solution.

value.title: Work with requirements as a solution architect for Microsoft Power Platform and Dynamics 365
value.excerpt: It is important to capture the customerâ€™s needs accurately. This module explains how to capture requirements and identify functional and non-functional items.

value.title: Decision Tree Classifier - Machine Learning in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to build a machine learning decision tree classifier in Power BI with some simple code. In the tutorial you will learn how to modify and visualize the model output so that you get the best results  This will be achieved with simple Python code. value.excerpt: We can utilize Python and Scikit-Learn machine algorithms in Power with the Run Script option. value.title: Bulk import data from multiple pages on a website with Power BI Desktop - Power BI Tips & Tricks #04
value.excerpt: Have you come across a website that has data you need but it is presented in multiple pages? Downloading page by page can be frustrating and time consuming. In this short video, I will show you how to iterate multiple pages on a website to import the data using Power BI.  LINK to NFL site: http://www.nfl.com/stats/categorystats?tabSeq=2&offensiveStatisticCategory=TEAM_PASSING&conference=ALL&role=TM&season=2015&seasonType=REG

value.title: DAX Fridays! #14: SUMMARIZE
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the function SUMMARIZE in DAX/ Powerpivot.  The function SUMMARIZE can return a summary of sales grouped around the calendar year and the product category name, this result table allows you to do analysis over the reseller sales by year and product category.  Source:https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg492171.aspx
